thread.title: Danniella Westbrook detoxes with early morning jog in Marbella as she winds down WILD Spanish holiday
thread.title_full: Danniella Westbrook detoxes with early morning jog in Marbella as she winds down WILD Spanish holiday

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Danniella Westbrook detoxes with early morning jog in Marbella as she winds down WILD Spanish holiday
text:
Danniella Westbrook detoxes with early morning jog in Marbella during WILD Spanish holiday Former EastEnders actress has been letting her hair down in Marbella Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Danniella Westbrook is on a serious health kick after partying hard in Marbella. 
The former EastEnders star had a busy trip doing everything from practicing her pole dancing to snogging Human Ken Doll Rodrigo Alves and is now back in the UK. 
But now more pictures have emerged from her Marbella break showing the star going for an early morning jog along the seafront in the sun-soaked Spanish town. 
And the 43 year old looked determined to concentrate on her fitness as she worked up a sweat in the sunshine. Read More Danniella Westbrook goes jogging in Marbella (Photo: RM70) 
She showed off her slim figure in blue and pink floral print leggings during her cardio session. 
She kept cool in a matching crop top – flaunting her defined abs and deep tan. 
She swept her blonde bob back off her face and wore a big pair of sunglasses. 
Danniella jogged with her friend Danni Levy before stopping off to do a spot of shopping. Read More The former EastEnders star laughed with her pal (Photo: RM70) 
The girls browsed a clothing store while seeking respite from the sun. 
The pictures came in stark contrast to the recent snaps of her leaving a kebab shop in the early hours of the morning. 
Last week, Danniella was spotted picking up food at 3am and taking selfies inside the takeaway shop before jumping into a taxi. 
The actress, who was dressed down in a black hooded sweater, black trousers, a fur gillet and trainers, stuck her tongue out to cameras before disappearing into the night. 
It's been a busy few weeks for the actress who indulged in everything from pole dancing to snogging Human Ken Doll Rodrigo Alves. She stopped running to shop (Photo: RM70) 
She said she was feeling "blessed" that she'd managed to turn her life around, writing alongside a selfie: "Super excited to board the plane home to the UK excited to see my babies my mates and get back to work a busy life and no ones wife is a life well lived.. 
"Feeling super blessed at the turn around in my life lately.. hard work determination and never ever letting my problems, my mental health, my bad choices in who I've trusted get the better of me. 
"Everything happens for a reason and out of every bad time comes some good. Strength keeps growing my character builds and my faith deepens.. my heart still on my sleeve and my loyalty never broken .. I'm truly grateful for everything I have and for the people I share that with [sic]." She got a new hair do while she was there (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) Fans loved her new look (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) 
Meanwhile, Danniella has said said she'd love to return to her role in EastEnders - but fears bosses would just "use" her for PR. 
When asked if she'd ever think about returning to the show, Danniella told The Sun Online : "Always, love EastEnders. The last time I went back fans [wanted me back] because [Sam’s] a superbitch and there’s good tension between her and Sharon and all that stuff. 
"And now because you haven’t got the Pauline, Peggy and Pat types older characters and it needs Sam, Sharon and Roxy but they just won’t do it. 
"They just will not do it. They have said I’m sacked, I’m this and that, they seem to use me for PR and not for the work." Like us on Facebook
